name: Sonic Inu
description: What is the project about? Sonic Inu is a meme token built on the Binance Smart Chain network and has gained popularity among crypto enthusiasts and fans of the video game character, Sonic the Hedgehog. It also has an NFT marketplace where users can buy, sell, and trade unique digital assets using BNB. What makes your project unique? The unique aspect of Sonic Inu is its connection to the popular video game character, Sonic the Hedgehog. Additionally, the token's smart contract provides 5% reflection of SONIC INU, which incentivize holders to keep the token. History of your project. Sonic Inu was launched as a meme token on the Binance Smart Chain on 21st April 2023. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Our NFT marketplace is ready where people can sell and buy NFTs. https://sonic-inu-nft-store.nftify.network/ What can your token be used for? The token can be used to participate in the Sonic Inu NFT marketplace, where users can buy, sell, and trade unique digital assets using BNB.
